lead_paragraph: The first contours of the negative campaign against the mayor are emerging, including a critical ad and a “Stop de Blasio” ballot line, even if no challengers have yet done so.

headline.print_headline: Ad and Ballot Line Among First Salvos Against de Blasio in ’ 1 7 Race
headline.main: Attack Ad Among First Salvos Against Mayor de Blasio in 2017 Race

snippet: The first contours of the negative campaign against the mayor are emerging, including a critical ad and a “Stop de Blasio” ballot line, even if no challengers have yet done so....
abstract: Video created by NYC Deserves Better is among first direct political attack ads launched against Mayor Bill de Blasio in nascent 2017 New York City mayoral campaign; second attack comes from Manhattan Republican Party, which successfully petitioned to add 'Stop de Blasio' line on ballot in two assembly races in districts where de Blasio is very unpopular.
